header.name: Branden Vennes
header.summary: Senior software engineer with 6+ years of experience in building scalable data platforms, event-driven systems, and schema management solutions. Proven track record in designing streaming architectures, implementing data workflows with modern tools, and driving quality through documentation and best practices. Passionate about enhancing development velocity with the right tools and building resilient systems that empower data producers and consumers.

experience.title: Software Engineer II
experience.detail: Built and maintained a streaming data platform serving dozens of teams across Disney+ and Hulu with schema registry and data publishing capabilities
Architected a stream-snapshot system enabling teams to maintain state from event streams, integrated into a content metadata unification project processing millions of entertainment entities
Designed complex validation pipelines using Jenkins and Github Actions to ensure schema compatibility and prevent runtime errors across production systems
Implemented multi-language code generation supporting Scala, Java, and Python with automatic semantic versioning and artifact publishing
Migrated teams from OpenAPI to AWS Smithy schemas, improving data payload definition accuracy and tooling integration
Developed comprehensive testing frameworks using Scalacheck integration and provided serialization libraries for JSON and Protobuf formats
Built data pipelines for the enterprise data-lake maintained in Databricks, processing streaming data for analytics, machine learning workflows, and executive decision-making

experience.title: Blockchain Platform Engineer

Created a transaction streaming client using http4s and Cats Effect with MongoDB indexing and Protobuf API for real-time block queries
Designed a React user-interface providing easy blockchain data querying for end users
